missionProperties.missionInfo:
{-} Doors are locked. A hero can interact with the terminal to try and slice it to unlock the door to the Cell.
{-} A Rebel figure can attack the door to the Archive (Health: 8, Defense: 5 {G}).
{-} The mission progresses when the door to the Archive is destroyed.
{-} The Rebels lose at the end of Round 6, or when all heroes are wounded.

changeRepositionOverride.theText: Block access to the terminal and the archive.

globalEvents.name: Open Crate 1
globalEvents.eventText:
You rummage through the supplies and take whatever seems useful.

Draw a supply card. You gain 1 medpac. Claim this token.

globalEvents.name: Open Crate 2
globalEvents.eventText:
You rummage through the supplies and take whatever seems useful.

Draw a supply card. You gain 1 medpac. Claim this token.

globalEvents.name: Open Crate 3
globalEvents.eventText:
You rummage through the supplies and take whatever seems useful.

Draw a supply card. You gain 1 medpac. Claim this token.

globalEvents.name: Open Crate 4
globalEvents.eventText:
You rummage through the supplies and take whatever seems useful.

Draw a supply card. You gain 1 medpac. Claim this token.

globalEvents.name: Mission Briefing
globalEvents.eventText:
It seems you arrived too late far your saboteur associates. They foolishly attempted the mission without you and now sit rotting in a cell.

Your new mission is to rescue them, or at the very least finish the job. Fortunately, they're being held relatively close to their original objective; it occurs to you that they may have incorporated this as part of their plan.

{-} Deploy the heroes to the blue highlighted space.
{-} Doors are locked. A hero can interact with the terminal to try and slice it to unlock the door to the Cell.
{-} A Rebel figure can attack the door to the Archive (Health: 8, Defense: 5 {G}).
{-} The mission progresses when the door to the Archive is destroyed.
{-} The Rebels lose at the end of Round 6, or when all heroes are wounded.

eventActions.theText: Destroy the door to the Archive.
eventActions.longText: Destroy the door to the Archive, either by yourself or with the help of the imprisoned saboteur team.

globalEvents.name: End of Mission - Rebels win
globalEvents.eventText:
Leaving the smoldering fragments of the data core scattered throughout the archive, you depart. Soon after, a message arrives from the saboteurs. Grateful for the assistance, they offer their service should you need it. Though they use unorthodox methods, you're pleased to have capable demolitionists at your disposal.

{-} The Rebels win the mission!
{-} Heroes receive the Rebel Saboteurs as allies.
{-} Each hero receives 1 XP. Heroes receive 100 credits per hero.

globalEvents.name: End of Mission - Rebels lose
globalEvents.eventText:
Imperial forces close in, and it seems more prudent to depart.

{-} The Rebels lose the mission.
{-} Each hero receives 1 XP. Heroes receive 100 credits per hero.

eventActions.theText:
You start to slice into the terminal.

Test {I}. Apply +1 {B} for each strain token on the terminal, then discard all strain tokens from the terminal. Enter the number of successes below.

inputList.theText:
You make some progress, but there is still a lot to do to overcome the Imperial security protocols.

{-} Place 1 strain token on the terminal for each {B} result gained.

globalEvents.name: Terminal sliced
globalEvents.eventText:
You slice into the Imperial security protocols and disable them.

The door to the Cell is now unlocked.

entityProperties.name: Cell Door
entityProperties.theText: The door to the Cell is unlocked.

entityProperties.name: Terminal
entityProperties.theText:
The security terminal hums with electricity.

A hero can interact with the terminal to try and slice into it to unlock the door to the Cell.

globalEvents.name: Finish the Job
globalEvents.eventText:
Without speaking, the operatives glance down, seeing some of their equipment in your hands. As they reach for it, one cocks his head slightly in question. You nod, telling them that there's no reason why the job can't still be done.

{-} The Rebel Saboteurs gain {B}: Pierce 2 instead of {B}: Pierce 1.
{-} When a Rebel Saboteur is defeated, he is incapacitated instead. When activating, he receives only 1 action.
{-} While a non-incapacitated Rebel Saboteur is attacking the door, apply + 1 {B} to the attack results .

entityProperties.name: Cell Door
entityProperties.theText: The door is locked. It can only be unlocked by slicing into the security terminal.

Destroy the door to the Archive.

globalEvents.name: Data Core
globalEvents.eventText:
The door collapses, and beyond its smoldering ruins lies the archive. The glowing data core is clearly visible. But it is not unguarded.

{-} The neutral mission token is the data core. A Rebel figure can attack the data core (Health: 6, Defense: None).
{-} The Rebels win when the data core is destroyed.

entityProperties.name: Archive Door
entityProperties.theText:
The door to the Archive is heavily fortified. 

{-} A Rebel figure can attack the door to the Archive (Health: 8, Defense: 5 {G}).

eventActions.theText:
{-} The Rebel Saboteurs gain {B}: Pierce 2 instead of {B}: Pierce 1.
{-} When a Rebel Saboteur is defeated, he is incapacitated instead. When activating, he receives only 1 action.
{-} While a non-incapacitated Rebel Saboteur is attacking the door, apply + 1 {B} to the attack results .
{-} The neutral mission token is the data core. A Rebel figure can attack the data core (Health: 6, Defense: None).
{-} The Rebels win when the data core is destroyed.
{-} The Rebels lose at the end of Round 6, or when all heroes are wounded.

One of the Royal Guards leaps forward, swinging his weapon.

{-} The closest Royal Guard interrupts to move 5 and attack {rebel}.
